asylumBefore3April2000.legend: Did you first apply for asylum before 3 April 2000?
asylumBefore3April2000.required: Select yes if you first applied for asylum before 3 April 2000.
asylumBefore3April2000.change: Change whether you first applied for asylum before 3 April 2000

successfulDecision.legend: Have you recently had a successful decision on your asylum application?
successfulDecision.required: Select yes if you have recently had a successful decision on your asylum application.
successfulDecision.change: Change whether you have recently had a successful decision on your asylum application

successfulDecisionDate.legend: What date did you get a successful decision on your application?
successfulDecisionDate.required: Enter the date you got a successful decision on your asylum application.
successfulDecisionDate.change: Change the date you got a successful decision on your application

supportedByHomeOffice.legend: Have you been supported by the Home Office while waiting for a decision on your application?
supportedByHomeOffice.required: Select yes if you have been supported by the Home Office while waiting for a decision on your application.
supportedByHomeOffice.change: Change whether you have been supported by the Home Office while waiting for a decision on your application
